item.title: Ubuntu Set Locale
item.description: set locale sudo apt-get install language-pack-en sudo locale-gen en_US.UTF-8 sudo update-locale LANG=en_US.UTF-8 LANGUAGE=en_US.UTF-8 LC_ALL=en_US.UTF-8 sudo update-locale LANG=en_US.UTF-8 source /etc/default/locale Then, restart terminator.
